title: [Control systems] Siemens security advisory (AV25-327)
description: On June 10, 2025, Siemens published advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following products:
products: RUGGEDCOM RST2428P (6GK6242-6PA00)   versions prior to V3.2
SCALANCE XC-300 products   versions prior to V3.2
SCALANE XC-400 products   versions prior to V3.2
SCALANCE XCM-/XRM-/XCH-/XRH-300 products   versions prior to V3.2
SCALANCE XM-400/XR-500 products   versions prior to V3.2
SCALANCE XR-300 (6GK5334-xTSxx) products   versions prior to V3.2
SIMATIC S7-1500 CPU products   version V3.1.5 and later
Technomatix Plant Simulation V2404   versions prior to V2404.0013
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
